ultra_super_attack.effect: Causes mega-colossal damage to all enemies

passive_skill.name: Overwhelming Combat
passive_skill.effect: Activates the Entrance Animation when there is an enemy whose name includes "Goku" (Youth, Captain Ginyu, Jr., etc. excluded) at the start of the character's attacking turn: (Once) Ki +3 and ATK 60% up; (Once) Ki +3; (Once) ATK & DEF 100% up; (Once) Guards all attacks; When attacking with 12 or more Ki: ATK & DEF 60% up; When attacking with 18 or more Ki: DEF 60% up; After guard is activated: Ki +3; ATK 30% up
